verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying
בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הוֹדַ֥ע <WH3045> to know אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> cause Jerusalem אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹעֲבֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH8441> her abominations

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <WH559> And say כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD לִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem מְכֹרֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH4351> Thy birth וּמֹ֣לְדֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH4138> and thy nativity מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> [is] of the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <WH3669> of Canaan אָבִ֥יךְ <WH1> thy father הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> [was] an Amorite וְאִמֵּ֥ךְ <WH517> and thy mother חִתִּֽית׃ <WH2850> an Hittite

וּמוֹלְדוֹתַ֗יִךְ <WH4138> And [as for] thy nativity בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> in the day הוּלֶּ֤דֶת <WH3205> thou wast born אֹתָךְ֙ <WH853> לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor כָרַּ֣ת <WH3772> was not cut שָׁרֵּ֔ךְ <WH8270> thy navel וּבְמַ֥יִם <WH4325> in water לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor רֻחַ֖צְתְּ <WH7364> neither wast thou washed לְמִשְׁעִ֑י <WH4935> to supple וְהָמְלֵ֙חַ֙ <WH4414> [thee] thou wast not salted לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הֻמְלַ֔חַתְּ <WH4414> at all וְהָחְתֵּ֖ל <WH2853> nor swaddled לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor חֻתָּֽלְתְּ׃ <WH2853> at all

לֹא־ <WH3808> No חָ֨סָה <WH2347> pitied עָלַ֜יִךְ <WH5921> and עַ֗יִן <WH5869> None eye לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> thee to do לָ֛ךְ אַחַ֥ת <WH259> any מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these לְחֻמְלָ֣ה <WH2550> of these unto thee to have compassion עָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> on וַֽתֻּשְׁלְכִ֞י <WH7993> upon thee but thou wast cast out אֶל־ <WH413> into פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> in the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> field בְּגֹ֣עַל <WH1604> to the lothing נַפְשֵׁ֔ךְ <WH5315> of thy person בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day הֻלֶּ֥דֶת <WH3205> that thou wast born אֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH853>

וָאֶעֱבֹ֤ר <WH5674> And when I passed עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> and וָֽאֶרְאֵ֔ךְ <WH7200> by thee and saw מִתְבּוֹסֶ֖סֶת <WH947> thee polluted בְּדָמָ֑יִךְ <WH1818> in thine own blood וָאֹ֤מַר <WH559> I said לָךְ֙ בְּדָמַ֣יִךְ <WH1818> unto thee [when thou wast] in thy blood חֲיִ֔י <WH2421> Live וָאֹ֥מַר <WH559> yea I said לָ֖ךְ בְּדָמַ֥יִךְ <WH1818> unto thee [when thou wast] in thy blood חֲיִֽי׃ <WH2421> Live

רְבָבָ֗ה <WH7233> thee to multiply כְּצֶ֤מַח <WH6780> as the bud הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> of the field נְתַתִּ֔יךְ <WH5414> I have caused וַתִּרְבִּי֙ <WH7235> and thou hast increased וַֽתִּגְדְּלִ֔י <WH1431> and waxen great וַתָּבֹ֖אִי <WH935> and thou art come בַּעֲדִ֣י <WH1157> for עֲדָיִ֑ים <WH5716> to excellent שָׁדַ֤יִם <WH7699> [thy] breasts נָכֹ֙נוּ֙ <WH3559> are fashioned וּשְׂעָרֵ֣ךְ <WH8181> and thine hair צִמֵּ֔חַ <WH6779> is grown וְאַ֖תְּ <WH859> you עֵרֹ֥ם <WH5903> whereas thou [wast] naked וְעֶרְיָֽה׃ <WH6181> and bare

וָאֶעֱבֹ֨ר <WH5674> Now when I passed עָלַ֜יִךְ <WH5921> over וָאֶרְאֵ֗ךְ <WH7200> by thee and looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold עִתֵּךְ֙ <WH6256> upon thee behold thy time עֵ֣ת <WH6256> [was] the time דֹּדִ֔ים <WH1730> of love וָאֶפְרֹ֤שׂ <WH6566> and I spread כְּנָפִי֙ <WH3671> my skirt עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> over וָאֲכַסֶּ֖ה <WH3680> over thee and covered עֶרְוָתֵ֑ךְ <WH6172> thy nakedness וָאֶשָּׁ֣בַֽע <WH7650> yea I sware לָ֠ךְ וָאָב֨וֹא <WH935> unto thee and entered בִבְרִ֜ית <WH1285> into a covenant אֹתָ֗ךְ <WH854> for נְאֻ֛ם <WH5002> with thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD וַתִּ֥הְיִי <WH1961> you became לִֽי׃

וָאֶרְחָצֵ֣ךְ <WH7364> Then washed בַּמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> I thee with water וָאֶשְׁטֹ֥ף <WH7857> yea I throughly washed away דָּמַ֖יִךְ <WH1818> thy blood מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> and וָאֲסֻכֵ֖ךְ <WH5480> from thee and I anointed בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> thee with oil

וָאַלְבִּישֵׁ֣ךְ <WH3847> I clothed רִקְמָ֔ה <WH7553> thee also with broidered work וָאֶנְעֲלֵ֖ךְ <WH5274> and shod תָּ֑חַשׁ <WH8476> thee with badgers' skin וָאֶחְבְּשֵׁ֣ךְ <WH2280> and I girded בַּשֵּׁ֔שׁ <WH8336> thee about with fine linen וַאֲכַסֵּ֖ךְ <WH3680> and I covered מֶֽשִׁי׃ <WH4897> thee with silk

וָאֶעְדֵּ֖ךְ <WH5710> I decked עֶ֑דִי <WH5716> thee also with ornaments וָאֶתְּנָ֤ה <WH5414> and I put צְמִידִים֙ <WH6781> bracelets עַל־ <WH5921> around יָדַ֔יִךְ <WH3027> upon thy hands וְרָבִ֖יד <WH7242> and a chain עַל־ <WH5921> around גְּרוֹנֵֽךְ׃ <WH1627> on thy neck

וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> And I put נֶ֙זֶם֙ <WH5141> a jewel עַל־ <WH5921> in אַפֵּ֔ךְ <WH639> on thy forehead וַעֲגִילִ֖ים <WH5694> and earrings עַל־ <WH5921> in אָזְנָ֑יִךְ <WH241> in thine ears וַעֲטֶ֥רֶת <WH5850> crown תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <WH8597> and a beautiful בְּרֹאשֵֽׁךְ׃ <WH7218> upon thine head

וַתַּעְדִּ֞י <WH5710> Thus wast thou decked זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> with gold וָכֶ֗סֶף <WH3701> and silver וּמַלְבּוּשֵׁךְ֙ <WH4403> and thy raiment [שֵׁשִׁי כ] (שֵׁ֤שׁ <WH8336> blue ק) וָמֶ֙שִׁי֙ <WH4897> and silk וְרִקְמָ֔ה <WH7553> and broidered work סֹ֧לֶת <WH5560> fine flour וּדְבַ֛שׁ <WH1706> and honey וָשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> and oil [אָכָלְתִּי כ] (אָכָ֑לְתְּ <WH398> burn up ק) וַתִּ֙יפִי֙ <WH3302> beautiful בִּמְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> and thou wast exceeding מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> were exceedingly וַֽתִּצְלְחִ֖י <WH6743> and thou didst prosper לִמְלוּכָֽה׃ <WH4410> into a kingdom

וַיֵּ֨צֵא <WH3318> went forth לָ֥ךְ שֵׁ֛ם <WH8034> And thy renown בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among the heathen בְּיָפְיֵ֑ךְ <WH3308> for thy beauty כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> it was כָּלִ֣יל <WH3632> for it [was] perfect ה֗וּא <WH1931> he בַּֽהֲדָרִי֙ <WH1926> through my comeliness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שַׂ֣מְתִּי <WH7760> which I had put עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> on נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> upon thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD

וַתִּבְטְחִ֣י <WH982> But thou didst trust בְיָפְיֵ֔ךְ <WH3308> in thine own beauty וַתִּזְנִ֖י <WH2181> and playedst the harlot עַל־ <WH5921> because שְׁמֵ֑ךְ <WH8034> because of thy renown וַתִּשְׁפְּכִ֧י <WH8210> and pouredst out אֶת־ <WH853> תַּזְנוּתַ֛יִךְ <WH8457> thy fornications עַל־ <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> every עוֹבֵ֖ר <WH5674> on every one that passed by לוֹ־ יֶֽהִי׃ <WH1961> become

וַתִּקְחִ֣י <WH3947> thou didst take מִבְּגָדַ֗יִךְ <WH899> And of thy garments וַתַּֽעֲשִׂי־ <WH6213> and deckedst לָךְ֙ בָּמ֣וֹת <WH1116> thy high places טְלֻא֔וֹת <WH2921> with divers colours וַתִּזְנִ֖י <WH2181> and playedst the harlot עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> on לֹ֥א <WH3808> never בָא֖וֹת <WH935> thereupon [the like things] shall not come וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> happen

וַתִּקְחִ֞י <WH3947> Thou hast also taken כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> jewels תִפְאַרְתֵּ֗ךְ <WH8597> thy fair מִזְּהָבִ֤י <WH2091> of my gold וּמִכַּסְפִּי֙ <WH3701> and of my silver אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> which I had given לָ֔ךְ וַתַּעֲשִׂי־ <WH6213> thee and madest לָ֖ךְ צַלְמֵ֣י <WH6754> to thyself images זָכָ֑ר <WH2145> of men וַתִּזְנִי־ <WH2181> and didst commit whoredom בָֽם׃

וַתִּקְחִ֛י <WH3947> And tookest אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> garments רִקְמָתֵ֖ךְ <WH7553> thy broidered וַתְּכַסִּ֑ים <WH3680> and coveredst וְשַׁמְנִי֙ <WH8081> mine oil וּקְטָרְתִּ֔י <WH7004> and mine incense [נָתַתִּי כ] (נָתַ֖תְּ <WH5414> add ק) לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וְלַחְמִי֩ <WH3899> My meat אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֨תִּי <WH5414> also which I gave לָ֜ךְ סֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> thee fine flour וָשֶׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> and oil וּדְבַשׁ֙ <WH1706> and honey הֶֽאֱכַלְתִּ֔יךְ <WH398> [wherewith] I fed וּנְתַתִּ֧יהוּ <WH5414> thee thou hast even set לִפְנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH6440> it before לְרֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> them for a sweet וַיֶּ֑הִי <WH1961> happened נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> and [thus] it was saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וַתִּקְחִ֞י <WH3947> Moreover thou hast taken אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנַ֤יִךְ <WH1121> thy sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1323> and thy daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יָלַ֣דְתְּ <WH3205> whom thou hast borne לִ֔י וַתִּזְבָּחִ֥ים <WH2076> unto me and these hast thou sacrificed לָהֶ֖ם לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <WH398> unto them to be devoured הַמְעַ֖ט <WH4592> a small matter [מִתַּזְנֻתֵךְ כ] (מִתַּזְנוּתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH8457> cut down ק)

וַֽתִּשְׁחֲטִ֖י <WH7819> That thou hast slain אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֑י <WH1121> my children וַֽתִּתְּנִ֔ים <WH5414> and delivered בְּהַעֲבִ֥יר <WH5674> them to cause them to pass through אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לָהֶֽם׃

וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹעֲבֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8441> And in all thine abominations וְתַזְנֻתַ֔יִךְ <WH8457> and thy whoredoms לֹ֥א <WH3808> not [זָכַרְתִּי כ] (זָכַ֖רְתְּ <WH2142> burn ק) אֶת־ <WH853> יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days נְעוּרָ֑יִךְ <WH5271> of thy youth בִּֽהְיוֹתֵךְ֙ <WH1961> become עֵרֹ֣ם <WH5903> when thou wast naked וְעֶרְיָ֔ה <WH6181> and bare מִתְבּוֹסֶ֥סֶת <WH947> [and] wast polluted בְּדָמֵ֖ךְ <WH1818> in thy blood הָיִֽית׃ <WH1961> become

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> And it came to pass after כָּל־ <WH3605> all רָעָתֵ֑ךְ <WH7451> all thy wickedness א֣וֹי <WH188> (woe א֣וֹי <WH188> woe לָ֔ךְ נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> unto thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> God

וַתִּבְנִי־ <WH1129> [That] thou hast also built לָ֖ךְ גֶּ֑ב <WH1354> unto thee an eminent place וַתַּעֲשִׂי־ <WH6213> and hast made לָ֥ךְ רָמָ֖ה <WH7413> thee an high place בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every רְחֽוֹב׃ <WH7339> in every street אֶל־ <WH413> in כָּל־ <WH3605> every

רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> at every head דֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> of the way בָּנִית֙ <WH1129> Thou hast built רָֽמָתֵ֔ךְ <WH7413> thy high place וַתְּתַֽעֲבִי֙ <WH8581> to be abhorred אֶת־ <WH853> יָפְיֵ֔ךְ <WH3308> and hast made thy beauty וַתְּפַשְּׂקִ֥י <WH6589> and hast opened אֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלַ֖יִךְ <WH7272> thy feet לְכָל־ <WH3605> of every עוֹבֵ֑ר <WH5674> to every one that passed by וַתַּרְבִּ֖י <WH7235> and multiplied אֶת־ <WH853> [תַּזְנֻתֵךְ כ] (תַּזְנוּתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH8457> cut down ק)

וַתִּזְנִ֧י <WH2181> Thou hast also committed fornication אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> with מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> the Egyptians שְׁכֵנַ֖יִךְ <WH7934> thy neighbours גִּדְלֵ֣י <WH1432> great בָשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> of flesh וַתַּרְבִּ֥י <WH7235> and hast increased אֶת־ <WH853> תַּזְנֻתֵ֖ךְ <WH8457> thy whoredoms לְהַכְעִיסֵֽנִי׃ <WH3707> to provoke me to anger

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold נָטִ֤יתִי <WH5186> Behold therefore I have stretched out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> my hand עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> against וָאֶגְרַ֖ע <WH1639> over thee and have diminished חֻקֵּ֑ךְ <WH2706> thine ordinary וָאֶתְּנֵ֞ךְ <WH5414> [food] and delivered בְּנֶ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> thee unto the will שֹׂנְאוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8130> of them that hate בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> thee the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines הַנִּכְלָמ֖וֹת <WH3637> which are ashamed מִדַּרְכֵּ֥ךְ <WH1870> way זִמָּֽה׃ <WH2154> of thy lewd

וַתִּזְנִי֙ <WH2181> Thou hast played the whore אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> with אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> the Assyrians מִבִּלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> because שָׂבְעָתֵ֑ךְ <WH7646> thou wast unsatiable וַתִּזְנִ֕ים <WH2181> yea thou hast played the harlot וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> and still לֹ֥א <WH3808> were not שָׂבָֽעַתְּ׃ <WH7654> with them and yet couldest not be satisfied

וַתַּרְבִּ֧י <WH7235> Thou hast moreover multiplied אֶת־ <WH853> תַּזְנוּתֵ֛ךְ <WH8457> thy fornication אֶל־ <WH413> with אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנַ֖עַן <WH3667> of Canaan כַּשְׂדִּ֑ימָה <WH3778> unto Chaldea וְגַם־ <WH1571> even בְּזֹ֖את <WH2063> herewith לֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׂבָֽעַתְּ׃ <WH7646> and yet thou wast not satisfied

חַי־ <WH2416> [As] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> lo עָֽשְׂתָה֙ <WH6213> hath not done סְדֹ֣ם <WH5467> Sodom אֲחוֹתֵ֔ךְ <WH269> thy sister הִ֖יא <WH1931> and her וּבְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> she nor her daughters כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עָשִׂ֔ית <WH6213> as thou hast done אַ֖תְּ <WH859> you וּבְנוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH1323> thou and thy daughters

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold זֶ֣ה <WH2088> this הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> had עֲוֹ֖ן <WH5771> Behold this was the iniquity סְדֹ֣ם <WH5467> Sodom אֲחוֹתֵ֑ךְ <WH269> of thy sister גָּא֨וֹן <WH1347> pride שִׂבְעַת־ <WH7653> fulness לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> of bread וְשַׁלְוַ֣ת <WH7962> and abundance הַשְׁקֵ֗ט <WH8252> of idleness הָ֤יָה <WH1961> had לָהּ֙ וְלִבְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> was in her and in her daughters וְיַד־ <WH3027> the hand עָנִ֥י <WH6041> of the poor וְאֶבְי֖וֹן <WH34> and needy לֹ֥א <WH3808> not הֶחֱזִֽיקָה׃ <WH2388> neither did she strengthen

וְשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> Neither hath Samaria כַּחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> half חַטֹּאתַ֖יִךְ <WH2403> of thy sins לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not חָטָ֑אָה <WH2398> committed וַתַּרְבִּ֤י <WH7235> but thou hast multiplied אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹעֲבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8441> thine abominations מֵהֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> more than they וַתְּצַדְּקִי֙ <WH6663> and hast justified אֶת־ <WH853> [אֲחֹותֵךְ כ] (אֲחֹותַ֔יִךְ <WH269> other ק) בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹעֲבוֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH8441> in all thine abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which [עָשִׂיתי כ] (עָשִֽׂית׃ <WH6213> accomplish ק)

גַּם־ <WH1571> Also אַ֣תְּ ׀ <WH859> you שְׂאִ֣י <WH5375> bear כְלִמָּתֵ֗ךְ <WH3639> thine own shame אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which פִּלַּלְתְּ֙ <WH6419> Thou also which hast judged לַֽאֲחוֹתֵ֔ךְ <WH269> thy sisters בְּחַטֹּאתַ֛יִךְ <WH2403> for thy sins אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הִתְעַ֥בְתְּ <WH8581> that thou hast committed more abominable מֵהֵ֖ן <WH2004> than they תִּצְדַּ֣קְנָה <WH6663> they are more righteous מִמֵּ֑ךְ <WH4480> more וְגַם־ <WH1571> Yes אַ֥תְּ <WH859> you בּ֙וֹשִׁי֙ <WH954> than thou yea be thou confounded וּשְׂאִ֣י <WH5375> also and bear כְלִמָּתֵ֔ךְ <WH3639> thy shame בְּצַדֶּקְתֵּ֖ךְ <WH6663> in that thou hast justified אַחְיוֹתֵֽךְ׃ <WH269> thy sisters

וְשַׁבְתִּי֙ <WH7725> When I shall bring again אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁבִ֣יתְהֶ֔ן <WH7622> of thy captives אֶת־ <WH853> [שְׁבִית כ] (שְׁב֤וּת <WH7622> their captivity ק) סְדֹם֙ <WH5467> of Sodom וּבְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and her daughters וְאֶת־ <WH853> [שְׁבִית כ] (שְׁב֥וּת <WH7622> their captivity ק) שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וּבְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> and her daughters [וּשְׁבִית כ] (וּשְׁב֥וּת <WH7622> their captivity ק) שְׁבִיתַ֖יִךְ <WH7628> captive בְּתוֹכָֽהְנָה׃ <WH8432> in the midst

לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> order תִּשְׂאִ֣י <WH5375> That thou mayest bear כְלִמָּתֵ֔ךְ <WH3639> thine own shame וְנִכְלַ֕מְתְּ <WH3637> and mayest be confounded מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> for all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you עָשִׂ֑ית <WH6213> in all that thou hast done בְּנַחֲמֵ֖ךְ <WH5162> in that thou art a comfort אֹתָֽן׃ <WH854> for

וַאֲחוֹתַ֗יִךְ <WH269> When thy sisters סְדֹ֤ם <WH5467> Sodom וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH1323> and her daughters תָּשֹׁ֣בְןָ <WH7725> shall return לְקַדְמָתָ֔ן <WH6927> to their former estate וְשֹֽׁמְרוֹן֙ <WH8111> and Samaria וּבְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and her daughters תָּשֹׁ֖בְןָ <WH7725> shall return לְקַדְמָתָ֑ן <WH6927> to their former estate וְאַתְּ֙ <WH859> you וּבְנוֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH1323> then thou and thy daughters תְּשֻׁבֶ֖ינָה <WH7725> shall return לְקַדְמַתְכֶֽן׃ <WH6927> to your former estate

וְל֤וֹא <WH3808> not הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> become סְדֹ֣ם <WH5467> Sodom אֲחוֹתֵ֔ךְ <WH269> For thy sister לִשְׁמוּעָ֖ה <WH8052> was not mentioned בְּפִ֑יךְ <WH6310> by thy mouth בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day גְּאוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <WH1347> of thy pride

בְּטֶרֶם֮ <WH2962> before תִּגָּלֶ֣ה <WH1540> was discovered רָעָתֵךְ֒ <WH7451> Before thy wickedness כְּמ֗וֹ <WH3644> so עֵ֚ת <WH6256> as at the time חֶרְפַּ֣ת <WH2781> of [thy] reproach בְּנוֹת־ <WH1323> of the daughters אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria וְכָל־ <WH3605> all סְבִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH5439> and all [that are] round about בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> her the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines הַשָּׁאט֥וֹת <WH7590> which despise אוֹתָ֖ךְ <WH853> מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> thee round about

אֶת־ <WH853> זִמָּתֵ֥ךְ <WH2154> thy lewdness וְאֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹעֲבוֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH8441> and thine abominations אַ֣תְּ <WH859> You נְשָׂאתִ֑ים <WH5375> Thou hast borne נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD [וְעָשִׂית כ] (וְעָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> do ק) אוֹתָ֖ךְ <WH854> for כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָשִׂ֑ית <WH6213> I will even deal אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּזִ֥ית <WH959> which hast despised אָלָ֖ה <WH423> the oath לְהָפֵ֥ר <WH6565> in breaking בְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> the covenant

וְזָכַרְתִּ֨י <WH2142> Nevertheless I will remember אֲנִ֧י <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֛י <WH1285> my covenant אוֹתָ֖ךְ <WH854> in בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> with thee in the days נְעוּרָ֑יִךְ <WH5271> of thy youth וַהֲקִמוֹתִ֥י <WH6965> and I will establish לָ֖ךְ בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> unto thee an everlasting

וְזָכַ֣רְתְּ <WH2142> Then thou shalt remember אֶת־ <WH853> דְּרָכַיִךְ֮ <WH1870> thy ways וְנִכְלַמְתְּ֒ <WH3637> and be ashamed בְּקַחְתֵּ֗ךְ <WH3947> when thou shalt receive אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH269> thy sisters הַגְּדֹל֣וֹת <WH1419> thine elder מִמֵּ֔ךְ <WH4480> because אֶל־ <WH413> and הַקְּטַנּ֖וֹת <WH6996> and thy younger מִמֵּ֑ךְ <WH4480> because וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> and I will give אֶתְהֶ֥ן <WH853> לָ֛ךְ לְבָנ֖וֹת <WH1323> them unto thee for daughters וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not מִבְּרִיתֵֽךְ׃ <WH1285> but not by thy covenant

וַהֲקִימוֹתִ֥י <WH6965> And I will establish אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> my covenant אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> and you וְיָדַ֖עַתְּ <WH3045> with thee and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> that תִּזְכְּרִי֙ <WH2142> That thou mayest remember וָבֹ֔שְׁתְּ <WH954> and be confounded וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> and never יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֥ךְ עוֹד֙ <WH5750> anymore פִּתְח֣וֹן <WH6610> and never open פֶּ֔ה <WH6310> thy mouth מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> any more because כְּלִמָּתֵ֑ךְ <WH3639> of thy shame בְּכַפְּרִי־ <WH3722> when I am pacified לָךְ֙ לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you עָשִׂ֔ית <WH6213> toward thee for all that thou hast done נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס
